title: Power’s La La Anthony teases shock character death will impact rest of season 6 finale
text:
It was the end of the road for LaKeisha (Picture: Netflix)

**Warning, contains spoilers for Power season 6.**

We’re still shook after watching the latest episode of Power’s finale season and it looks like a load more drama is on the way.

Episode eight, titled Deal With The Devil, saw Tasha St Patrick (Naturi Naughton) kill her former best friend LaKeisha (La La Anthony) – and we’ll probably never get over the scandalous scenes.

Unsurprisingly though, LaKeisha’s sudden passing is going to have major repercussions for the rest of the series.

Teasing what’s in store, actress La La revealed: ‘It’s not going to just go away. They’re going to be trying to figure out what happened, how it happened.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

‘And I think in that way, LaKeisha continues to live on, even with me not being there.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

She continued to Entertainment Weekly: ‘Tommy [Joeseph Sikora] definitely will be trying to get to the bottom of it. I think she’ll still be in front of mind for a lot of people.’

Yikes.

La La added that she ‘wasn’t as surprised as you think’ about Tasha firing the gun, saying: ‘The only other logical person outside of maybe Ghost would be Tasha, and it goes back really to the demise of their entire friendship.

‘So many people who watch the show say they can relate to that, someone you’ve been friends with your whole life and suddenly something happens and you fall out and can never recover from that.’

Judging by the preview for the next episode, Tommy is going to take justice into his own hands.

In the teaser clip, it looks like the gangster believes that James St Patrick (Omari Hardwick) is behind LaKeisha’s death as payback for killing his bit-on-the-side Angela Valdez (Lela Loren) and utters a stern word of warning.

Are we finally going to see the end of Ghost?

Power airs Sundays on Starz in the US and with the latest episodes dropping on Netflix on Monday in the UK.

description: Power star teases how *that* shock character death will impact rest of season 6 finale.
